tools.name: search_corpus
tools.description: Search the document corpus for relevant content using semantic similarity. Returns the most relevant chunks matching the query.

query.description: The search query to find relevant documents.

top_k.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10).

tools.name: get_chunk
tools.description: Retrieve a specific document chunk by its ID. Returns the chunk content and associated metadata.

chunk_id.description: The unique identifier of the chunk to retrieve.
